createReleaseAction.title: Create content release
createReleaseAction.exists: The release name must be unique per site

updateReleaseAction.title: Update content release
updateReleaseAction.exists: The release name must be unique per site

removeReleaseAction.title: Remove content release
removeReleaseAction.text:
Remove a content release will only remove it from the list.

Content associated to this release will not be deleted. However, their last modification date and publication status will be updated
